text:
$BIT will be used for gas fees, staking and the ecosystem token on the @0xMantle network. 

All dApps on the network are built by the community. The internal team will not be building native dApps.

Stay safe $BIT community !

Live long and prosper 🖖

quoted_tweet.text:
Fam, we're excited to see all the new dApps being built on #Mantle Network! As the ecosystem grows, here's a reminder:

1. $BIT is Mantle's only token! Any token comprising "Mantle" are not officially issued by the network.
2. All dApps on Mantle are built by the community.
